content: what is  Chrome extension: add instapaper button to feedly?

The Chrome extension "Add Instapaper Button to Feedly" is a tool that enhances the functionality of the Feedly RSS reader by providing an additional button that allows users to save articles directly to their Instapaper account. Instapaper is a service that lets users save web articles to read later in a clean and clutter-free interface. With this extension, Feedly users can easily bookmark articles they come across and access them later in their Instapaper account.
